bbc_urd_20090120.0023__9
barack obama said today as we are honoring his memory it is not a day to stop and think act was of the view when respecting remembrance this should ponder honour just pause reflect that legacy its remembering him so for us barrack memories also saying king martin luther then stand in respect instead adopt sayings our practice stay he jr but
Barack Obama said, "Today, as we are honoring his memory, it is not a day to stop and think. It is a day to act."
barack obama said today as we are honoring his memory it is not a day to stop and think it is a day to act
